author: alexnoob13
comment: Ur taking O-lvls this year? U should def go poly than jc than maybe university so u can earn more money as an accountant. My mum works as an accountant and she earns abt 6k-7k per month and she only graduated from poly. I'm only 14 so I don't know much but that's what I heard from family and friends.
